DOC.brief_summary: An echocardiogram using Definity contrast can provide the same information as the standard right heart catheterization.
DOC.brief_title: Estimation of Pulmonary Vascular Resistance by Contrast Echocardiography
DOC.criteria: Adult patients scheduled to undergo right heart catheterization at the George Washington University Hospital Patients with known or suspected righttoleft bidirectional or transient righttoleft shunts or pulmonary arteriovenous malformations, previously documented moderate to severe tricuspid regurgitation or moderate to severe pulmonary regurgitation, evidence of right ventricular hypokinesis, or prior adverse reaction to Definity or hypersensitivity to perflutren
